modName: Skyrim Tropical Style Suit for Demon Fet
summary: Conversion of LuisWolf's Skyrim Tropical Style Suit for the Demon Fet Body
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url] [url=https://postimg.org/image/7zb6y9bm1/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/ffagk1zbh/Skyrim_Tropical_Style_Suit_TEXT2_TEST.png[/img][/url][color=#5ea2e5][url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url][/color]
                                                           I encourage everyone to PLEASE!!! upload your ScreenShots.

[url=https://postimg.org/image/jv6nujfux/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/ejrr9ttsd/Cover_Page0.png[/img][/url]
                                                       [url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url][img]https://i.imgur.com/u3popun.png[/img][url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url]

This is a SeveNBase Based Conversion of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77303/?]LouisWolf's Skyrim Tropical Style Suit[/url] for the Demon Fet Body
The Demon Fet Body is a skinnier more well endowed version of the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase[/url] BombShell.

It is TBBP-BBP compatible, with Working weight Slider. Make sure you install the proper requirements listed below
all the elements from the Original Mod are left intact, only the  meshes were altered to fit the Demon Fet Body.
[b][i][size=3]
[color=#ff0000]To aquire the Outfit:[/color][/size][/i][/b]
The Outfit can be crafted at any Forge, or Type: Help LW in the Command Console to obtain a container that has the Outfits.

[url=https://postimg.org/image/wb3doa96x/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/n3b57l24t/Cover_Page1.png[/img][/url]

                                               [url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url][img]https://i.imgur.com/oQhwEBV.png[/img][url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url]
[i][b][size=4][color=#ff7700]Requires:[/color] [/size][/b][/i][i][b][size=3] [color=#b45f06]DAWNGUARD, HEARTHFIRES, & DRAGONBORN.[/color] [color=#00ff00]DLC's[/color]
[/size][/b][/i][color=#ff7700]
[/color][b][i][size=4][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/kt4n8a51o8036be/Demon+Fet+Body+%26+-LABIA-.7z][color=#ff7700]Demon Fet Body[/color][/url] [/size][/i][/b]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5251077/?]DeMoNhUnTeR1986
[/url]The Body isn't necessarily required but is here for anyone who might want to try this body out.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?][b][i][color=#ff7700][size=4]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended -XPMSE-[/size][/color][/i][/b][/url]  By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3350373/?]Groovtama[/url]

If you for any reason have issues with the xp32 skeletons try downloading [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/m6h7o7irdj5pm43/Zquad1%27s+Skeleton+for++Demon+Fet+Body.7z#39;s_Skeleton_for__Demon_Fet_Body.7z]My Skeleton[/url] & you shouldn't have anymore issues.
[url=https://postimg.org/image/dy2sdpyq1/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/wdn9b4cul/Cover_Page2.png[/img][/url]

                                                  [url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/hyKTPfg.png[/img][url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url]
These are loose files so you will need to install this manually now you can install through NMM but I don't include the FOMOD file.

so just drop the files into your Skyrim directory. the file path for that is  C:/Programs(x86)/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data.
Now Activate the .ESP by clicking on the "SkyrimLauncher.exe" then Exit out of the Launcher & then click on Loot to finish the activation.
if you need Loot Click here---> [url=https://github.com/loot/loot/releases/tag/0.9.1]LOOT

[color=#ffffff]                                                                                        [/color][color=#00ff00]"Thank You So much for Downloading"
[/color][/url]                                      [img]https://s20.postimg.org/g8llfh1jh/Signature_Final1.jpg[/img]
                                                            [url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url]  [img]https://i.imgur.com/eV272UF.png[/img][url=https://postimg.org/image/k2uar1qtl/][img]https://s20.postimg.org/vf6w8tzil/palm_tree1.png[/img][/url]

[color=#ff7700]                                                                                    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5251077/?][color=#ff7700]DeMoNhUnTeR 1986[/color][/url][/color]  For the Demon Fet Body.
